Body:
self.model = GLM(solver='IRLS', family=NegativeBinomialWrapper(),
    fit_intercept=True, est_stderr=True, reg_method=None, alpha=0, l1_ratio
    =0, tol=0.0001, max_iter=100, coef=None, stderr=None, dispersion=None)
print(self.Y[0:1,])
self.model.fit(self.X[0:1, :], self.Y[0:1,], sample_weight=0.5)
self.assertEqual(self.model.coef.shape, (7,))
self.assertAlmostEqual(self.model.dispersion, 0, places=6)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.X[0
    :1, :], self.Y[0:1,]), np.array([0]), decimal=3)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(np.array
    (self.X[0:1, :].tolist() * 6), np.array([6, 60, 6, 0, 6, 62])), np.
    array([0, -np.Infinity, 0, -np.Infinity, 0, -np.Infinity]), decimal=3)
